Room.Name: Shadow Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a room filled with constantly moving shadows.
Room.LongDescription: The mages who have pledged their allegiance to Prince Ragnar maintain a weapons research room directly south of here, but be warned, if you go in there, you will not be able to bring anything back out the one-way portal you see at the south wall. A cool breeze swirls through the room as you stand here, and the shifting shadows occasionly show you a skeleton hanging from chains on the wall. The main armory is north.
